item.title: Tree trynk growth affecting road safety, 11th July
item.description:
The tree outside 67 Tremaine Rd has a great deal of growth from low down on the trunk. They s is significantly affecting the ability to see traffic when pulling out of my driveway or when crossing the road particularly for children or wheelchair users

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tremaine Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grafton Road/ Cressfield Close, 11th July
item.description:
The CCTV monitoring the no entry to vehicles has been out of action/missing since my original report 3 months ago. The CCTV is the responsibility of the Council.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 234, Grafton Road, Gospel Oak, London

item.title: Leak, 11th July
item.description:
There is a leak from this overflow on Beaufoy House on the York hill estate. It's been leaking for months, at the very least 6 months. Please do mend this leak as it must be wasting huge amounts of water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdowne Hill, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting, 11th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Kevington Drive, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Flickering street light,, 11th July
item.description:
Flickering street light, someone actually placed a black board in front to prevent the flickering into the bedroom, it’s doest’t work, I’m having to close blind to avoid the light flickering into my face in this heat. Please fix the issue or remove the bulb. This will affect people with epilepsy as well. This has been reported several time before
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shawbrooke Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 1 button doesn’t work, 11th July
item.description:
The number 1 button doesn’t work, this has occurred more than 3 times. The door system is old and needs to changed ASAP! This isn’t good enough
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Weston Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of discarded raw chicken, 11th July
item.description:
As I left my car I could see a huge pile of discarded raw chicken thighs. The smell was strong and will attract foxes and rats to the area. Please can you deal with this as matter of urgency?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Studley Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missed bins, 11th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchfields Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Left vehicles, 11th July
item.description:
This car and trailer has been left in our road for many weeks at this point. The car is sometimes removed from the flatbed, then put back on the truck. But it’s a nuisance for all residents here as it takes up 2-3 spaces in an already crowded road. No one who lives here owns these vehicles so we would appreciate it you marked them for removal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydney Road, Colney Hatch, London
Report on FixMyStreet
